messages.subject: WAS: Need help with unschooling! Now: Dedaycaring???
messages.msgSnippet: Hi All~ I am wondering if a child who was in Daycare would go through
messages.messageBody:
<He was healing from school and just needed a lot of time to get to know
himself again.>


Hi All~

I am wondering if a child who was in Daycare would go through a similar "deschooling" phase when out of daycare, as if they were in school? My oldest DD is 4 1/2 and even though she hasn't been in daycare since she was 3, I have been Nannying outside the home with my children for the past year and a half and now will be home with both the girls, and working outside the home in the evenings.

Just wondered if others have been in a similar situation? I feel like she has some things to heal from her daycare experience. And wondering if anyone has any suggestion on how to support her.

Laura
in St. Paul
Brynn
Maya




---------------------------------
Be a better friend, newshound, and know-it-all with Yahoo! Mobile. Try it now.
